metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0492
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s cgroup_release_agent_write in the kernel/cgroup/cgroup-v1.c function. This flaw, under certain circumstances, allows the use of the cgroups v1 release_agent feature to escalate privileges and bypass the namespace isolation unexpectedly.
